sv:property.sv:value: Now you are on home page which presents using of teasers. As a first step I would recomend to go to Sample page and see what are a basics of using TB and Magnolia, like how to work with rows and compoents.
on Demo page which presents Twitter Bootstrap framework running on Magnolia
Two teasers in one row, each of them with different style
Twitter Bootstrap on Magnolia Demo (by Tomas Gregovsky)

This page consist of multiple row filled text & image components to demonstrate how to work with content and how is final page responsive. BTW: all components on this page are one same component just with different styles options.
